name: Stainless Steel Rabbit Litter Box,Bunny Litter Pan with Widened Grid,Toilet Tray,High Back Wall,Deep Waste Storage (Medium)
short_description: Stainless Steel Rabbit Litter Box – Durable & Hygienic: Crafted from high-quality stainless steel, this rabbit litter box is rust-resistant, stain-proof, and odor-neutral, providing a clean and long-lasting toilet solution for your bunny. Ideal for pet owners seeking durability and effortless maintenance.

Comfortable 12mm thickened and Widened stainless steel Grid – Keeps Bunny Feet Clean: Our bunny litter box features a professionally designed 12mm grid that effectively separates waste from your pet’s feet. No more messy paws or uncomfortable standing—your bunny stays clean and dry while waste falls below. The thickened stainless steel grid is much more comfortable and healthier for your rabbit’s feet than traditional wire mesh, preventing injuries and irritation.

Extra-Large Waste Storage – Easy Cleaning Routine: Designed with a deep, spacious waste compartment, It can use wood pellets to absorb urine and odors.this litter box for rabbit reduces the frequency of cleaning while keeping odors controlled. A practical solution for busy pet owners who value hygiene and convenience.

High Back Wall – Splash Protection Against Urine Spray: The elevated rear and side walls prevent urine from spilling out, keeping your bunny’s living space tidy. This large rabbit litter box ensures a cleaner environment by containing messes more effectively than low-profile trays.
Stable and Spacious Bunny Tray: This rabbit litter pan provides plenty of room to move while preventing tipping. Its sturdy structure offers a safe, comfortable potty zone for your furry friend.
product_description: Keep Your Bunny’s Paws Clean & Home Odor-Free – Premium Stainless Steel Rabbit Litter Box! Say goodbye to messy cages and smelly corners! Our stainless steel bunny litter box is designed with pet comfort and cleanliness in mind. Featuring a hygienic 12mm grid, it keeps your rabbit’s feet clean while efficiently collecting waste below. The extra-large waste compartment means less frequent cleaning, and the high back wall stops urine spray in its tracks. Durable, rust-proof, and easy to clean, this litter tray is built to last. Plus, it’s compatible with wood pellets to absorb urine and odors naturally. Perfect for rabbits, and other small animals—finally, a litter box that works as hard as you do.
